text: The Dark Mirror is a 1946 American crime thriller movie directed by Robert Siodmak and starring Olivia de Havilland, Lew Ayers, Thomas Mitchell, Garry Owen, Lela Bliss, Lester Allen. It was distributed by Universal Pictures and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1947. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1946 crime movies Category:1946 thriller movies Category:1940s American crime thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Siodmak Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies about psychiatry Category:Movies about twin sisters
title: The Dark Mirror (1946 movie)
